2024-03-01
'use strict'; const escapeRegExp = require('./escape_regexp'); const rParam = /:(\w*[^_\W])/g; class Permalink { constructor(rule, options) { if (!rule) { throw new TypeError('rule is required!'); } options = options || {}; const segments = options.segments || {}; const params = []; const regex = escapeRegExp(rule) .replace(rParam, (match, name) => { params.push(name); if (Object.prototype.hasOwnProperty.call(segments, name)) { const segment = segments[name]; if (segment instanceof RegExp) { return segment.source; } return segment; } return '(.+?)'; }); this.rule = rule; this.regex = new RegExp(`^${regex}$`); this.params = params; } test(str) { return this.regex.test(str); } parse(str) { const match = str.match(this.regex); const { params } = this; const result = {}; if (!match) { return; } for (let i = 1, len = match.length; i < len; i++) { result[params[i - 1]] = match[i]; } return result; } stringify(data) { return this.rule.replace(rParam, (match, name) => data[name]); } } module.exports = Permalink;
